metadata.title: CVE-2022-3590 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress is affected by an unauthenticated blind SSRF in the pingbackfeature. Because of a TOCTOU race condition between the validation checksand the HTTP request, attackers can reach internal hosts that areexplicitly forbidden.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
